message.body: Heya chiquita! We are looking for a place to host a se√±or papos show on July 13. Do you and your home happen to be into it?
I will be out of town that weekend! Do you know Gus? He lives in a warehouse space in Old City and he wants people to use it as a venue.
Oh, drat. Don't know him...do you have his digits?
I dont now but I am friends with him on Facebook. I will get his info and pass it along!
